titleStmt.title: To all People upon the face of the earth.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Simmons, at the sign of the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Perrot. Cf. DNB.
